overview: While locked-up for six years in federal prison, artist Jesse Krimes secretly creates monumental works of artâ€”including an astonishing 40-foot mural made with prison bed sheets, hair gel, and newspaper. He smuggles out each panel piece-by-piece with the help of fellow artists, only seeing the mural in totality upon coming home. As Jesse's work captures the art world's attention, he struggles to adjust to life outside, living with the threat that any misstep will trigger a life sentence.
tagline: Witness a masterwork years in the making, from solitary confinement to world-renowned artist
title: Art & Krimes by Krimes
